headlines.description: UC Iroegbu hit three 3-pointers and scored 17 points and Stony Brook defeated New Hampshire 72-63 on Sunday to split the season series and join the Wildcats in fifth place in the America East Conference.
headlines.shortLinkText: Iroegbu leads Stony Brook past New Hampshire 72-63

headlines.description: Will Rayman scored 15 points to help Colgate beat Loyola (Md.) 68-47 on Sunday.

nowFeed.headline: Oklahoma freshman Trae Young, the national leader in scoring at 29 PPG, is shooting 4 for 27 from 3-point range in the Sooners' past three games, all losses. Young had the attention of Allen Fieldhouse throughout OU warmups. He scored 26 on 7-of-9 shooting in Oklahoma's win last month over Kansas.
nowFeed.story: Oklahoma freshman Trae Young, the national leader in scoring at 29 PPG, is shooting 4 for 27 from 3-point range in the Sooners' past three games, all losses. Young had the attention of Allen Fieldhouse throughout OU warmups. He scored 26 on 7-of-9 shooting in Oklahoma's win last month over Kansas.

nowFeed.headline: Will Oklahoma, which has lost five straight, try to rekindle some of its earlier form by going back to the Hack-a-Dok strategy that helped it beat Kansas 85-80 on Jan. 23? The Sooners intentionally fouled 7-foot Kansas center Udoka Azubuike several times in the win as he shot 1 of 7 from the line. Azubuike has slightly improved his free-throw shooting over the past month. He was at 41 percent before the debacle in Norman; he's now shooting 44.7 percent.
nowFeed.story: Will Oklahoma, which has lost five straight, try to rekindle some of its earlier form by going back to the Hack-a-Dok strategy that helped it beat Kansas 85-80 on Jan. 23? nowFeed.headline: Another Big Monday at tap at Allen Fieldhouse, where No. 8 Kansas faces slumping Oklahoma and star freshman Trae Young tonight. The Jayhawks are also home next Monday against Texas, sandwiched around a visit Saturday to Texas Tech, which will loom extremely large in Kansas' bid to win at least a share of its 14th straight Big 12 title. Coach Bill Self is 24-0 at home on Big Monday.

nowFeed.headline: Spoke with E.J Montgomery who currently sits at no.16 in the ESPN 100. He has visited Duke and North Carolina unofficially and plans to go back to both for official visits. Kentucky is up next for an official visit on February 24th. He and is family are deciding on a fourth visit between Georgetown and Wake Forest. At 6'10" Montgomery  possesses a 7'2" wing span with a soft mid-range touch.  He is playing with more assertiveness and that has translated to his rebounding numbers. The bottom line is he has made steady progress over his career with plenty of growth left in his game.
nowFeed.story: Spoke with E.J Montgomery who currently sits at no.16 in the ESPN 100. He has visited Duke and North Carolina unofficially and plans to go back to both for official visits. At 6'10" Montgomery  possesses a 7'2" wing span with a soft mid-range touch.  He is playing with more assertiveness and that has translated to his rebounding numbers. The bottom line is he has made steady progress over his career with plenty of growth left in his game.

nowFeed.headline: Former Espn 100 Hasahn French earns co-Rookie of the Week honors at Saint Louis. French has set a single-season freshman record for blocks in a season with 52. The school record for blocked shots in a season across all classes is 73, set by Willie Reed in the 2009-10 season.  Saint Louis takes on Dayton tomorrow night 9pm on ESPNU.

nowFeed.headline: Houston (21-5), on the strength of a five-game winning streak including a win over Cincinnati, is No. 23 in the latest Associated Press top 25 poll. It's the first time the Cougars have been ranked in the AP poll since Dec. 12, 2005.
nowFeed.story: Houston (21-5), on the strength of a five-game winning streak including a win over Cincinnati, is No. 23 in the latest Associated Press top 25 poll. It's the first time the Cougars have been ranked in the AP poll since Dec. 12, 2005.

nowFeed.headline: Texas Tech leading scorer Keenan Evans, who left the Red Raiders loss to Baylor on Saturday with a toe injury, is day-to-day, coach Chris Beard confirmed Monday. Evans missed the entire second half on Saturday. Texas Tech, who is tied for first in the Big 12 with Kansas, plays at Oklahoma State on Wednesday.
nowFeed.story: Texas Tech leading scorer Keenan Evans, who left the Red Raiders loss to Baylor on Saturday with a toe injury, is day-to-day, coach Chris Beard confirmed Monday. nowFeed.headline: Not many have had a better five game stretch than Baylor's 6'8" senior forward Terry Maston. He is shooting 63% from the field and is averaging 16ppg during that span. The Bears have won 5 in a row. Scott Drew's team is improving and peaking at the right time in the Big 12 conference.

nowFeed.headline: AAC race getting awfully interesting. Cincinnati a game up, but still has to play at Wichita. Wichita still has to travel to SMU and UCF before hosting Cincinnati. And Houston has the easiest remaining schedule.

nowFeed.headline: Gregg Marshall in a tough spot with Austin Reaves (2-for-4 from the 3-point line). He's a good shooter in a close game. But Cane Broome is torching him right now.
nowFeed.story: Gregg Marshall in a tough spot with Austin Reaves (2-for-4 from the 3-point line). He's a good shooter in a close game. But Cane Broome is torching him right now.

nowFeed.headline: Bearcats stuck in a scoring drought for the last 3:08. They're not effective with their half-court sets. But Wichita State relying on multiple players who are creating their own shots. That's the difference right now.
